entries.title: Is plane tracking doxxing? How public data enraged Elon Musk.
entries.description: The jet tracking account was permanently suspended from Twitter. Elon Musk doesn’t want public information about his jet being shared on the site.

entries.title: A guide to getting started with Twitter alternative Mastodon
entries.description: How to get started on social-media site Mastodon, whether you're leaving Twitter or just looking for people who have.
